entries.title: ‘Madden NFL 23’ to drop CPR celebration after Damar Hamlin cardiac arrest
entries.description: Electronic Arts will remove a touchdown celebration mimicking CPR following Buffalo Bills player Damar Hamlin's hospitalization from cardiac arrest.

entries.title: Russia to send replacement spacecraft to retrieve crew from space station
entries.description: Officials have determined that a Soyuz vehicle that sprang a leak last month, probably because of an impact from a micrometeoroid, is too compomised to return two Russian cosmonauts and an American astronaut to earth safely.

entries.title: Work reset: 13 tips to make your job less stressful this year
entries.description: Productivity experts offer these 13 tips to help workers improve their performance and lower their stress during the year.

entries.title: How science fiction helped inspire the modern space movement
entries.description: Space moguls and NASA scientists alike have credited science fiction for helping inspire space exploration. These works stand out the most.
